/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and brown accents, reflecting the urban architectural style of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A few cars and buses can be seen on the road, indicating the city's active life. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, enhancing the colors and casting shadows that add depth to the scene.
